## SpinnerLike interface

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

A loading spinner

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface SpinnerLike 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [text](./ember-asset-size-report.spinnerlike.text.md) | <code>string</code> | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Spinner text |

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [info(msg)](./ember-asset-size-report.spinnerlike.info.md) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Print an info message to the console |
|  [start(msg)](./ember-asset-size-report.spinnerlike.start.md) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Start spinning |
|  [succeed(msg)](./ember-asset-size-report.spinnerlike.succeed.md) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Print a success message to the console |
|  [succeedAndStart(msg)](./ember-asset-size-report.spinnerlike.succeedandstart.md) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Print a success message to the console, and resume spinning |
